oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE EFFICIENCY OF BIO PRODUCTION IN ROMANIA
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SABAU, PH-D STUDENT MARIUS MIRCEA
MIHAI, UNIV. PROFESSOR PH-D GHEORGHE
FUNAR, UNIV. PROFESSOR PH-D SABINA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Romania
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a study related to organic agriculture efficiency in Romania. The study made in the year of 2004 intended to assess the structure and productionâ€™s level on this field of agriculture. As resulted following this research the efficiency (Yields/ha)in the field of organic production is not less than conventional efficiency. In a way surprisingly is the conclusion that the efficiency (Yields/ha) is not increasing on bigger cultivated surfaces.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: SABAU, PH-D STUDENT MARIUS MIRCEA; MIHAI, UNIV. PROFESSOR PH-D GHEORGHE and FUNAR, UNIV. PROFESSOR PH-D SABINA (2006) THE EFFICIENCY OF BIO PRODUCTION IN ROMANIA. Paper at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
